title: News: Ghosting Season/Cloud Boat Tour
body:
This week sees the beginning of **Ghosting Season**‘s mini tour with **Cloud Boat**, with events commencing at Manchester’s **Kraak Gallery** and yours truly will be representing **Crack In The Road** on the decks.

However this is no mere stroking of my ego, rather this tour, which includes further stops in London, Nottingham and Sheffield, is a fantastic opportunity to catch these two sets of highly talented pairs before they reach the widespread critical acclaim they are already developing. 

Manchester Event Details can be found **[here!](http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=241284579255198&ref=ts)**

**Ghosting Season**, born out of the ashes of **worriedaboutsatan**, recently performed to a pack out audience supporting our favourite crazy kids **TEETH**, and since their move to their new home in Manchester the band have received only high praise from respected establishments such as **Drowned in Sound** and **The Quietus**. **Crack In The Road** managed to catch the band performing at Sheffield’s **Tramlines Festival** and we were thoroughly absorbed by the sheer brooding energy that builds in **Ghosting Season**‘s dark electronica sound. 

**Cloud Boat** are more than worthy support, with their beautiful orchestration of distorted vocals and calming beats earning their track ‘Lions on the Beach’ the coveted **Clash Music** Single of the Week. Recently signed to **R&S Records**, **Cloud Boat** are set to return to Manchester in November to perform at the famed **Warehouse Project**, however the intimate settings of **Kraak Gallery** will provide a very special performance indeed. Joining them on their Manchester leg is **Crack In The Road **favourite** Hourglass Sea**, and you can hear his brand new (and very rad) tune here!

[Dream Warrior](http://soundcloud.com/hourglasssea/dream-warrior) by [Hourglass Sea](http://soundcloud.com/hourglasssea)
